**Example 1: 新建商品**



Input: 

```
tccli trp CreateProduct --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Remark xx \
    --Name xx \
    --Specification xx \
    --Logo url1 \
    --MerchantId xx \
    --MerchantName xx
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "ProductId": "tz6jpscwky41u23o9b",
        "RequestId": "5ef09b37-e0c0-49b2-89ad-3345916d7abb"
    }
}
```
